title: Bride Swap
overview: In her past life, Xie Minglan was bestowed the title of a first-rank noble lady, basking in glory and prestige. Meanwhile, her sister Xie Molan became a young widow, confined to a lonely Buddhist retreat. Consumed by jealousy, Xie Molan killed Xie Minglan, only to find herself reborn with her sister on the day when they were both to be wed. This time, Xie Molan desperately schemes to marry Mr. Pei, the down-and-out heir, believing this will swap their fates. Little does she know that she has chosen a path of no return.
